name: Scoopy the Spoon Thief
description:
Infiltrate restaurants in search of spoons as the evasive spoon thief Scoopy. Stealthily sneak past security so you can add to your collection the most highly valued spoons in the world.

Instructions

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys for movement. Click on spoons on the wall to enter the restaurants.
